name: Emma Frost

abilities.name: Telepathic Pulse (Human)
abilities.damage: Ramps up (~25 -> ~110 per tick) on single target over 2s
abilities.details: Continuous psionic beam. Damage increases with focus duration. Consumes energy.

abilities.name: Mind's Aegis (Human)
abilities.details: Projects a floating psionic shield barrier.

abilities.name: Psychic Spear (Human)
abilities.details: Hit creates a linked crystal (~200 HP). Damaging crystal damages enemy. Shattering deals bonus burst.

abilities.name: Crystal Kick (Diamond)
abilities.details: Kicks enemies back, deals extra damage on wall impact.

abilities.name: Carbon Crush (Diamond)
abilities.details: Lunge, grab, slam enemy, interrupting abilities. Brief stun on landing.

ultimate.name: Psionic Seduction
ultimate.effect: Human: Stun (1s), Ult Lock (5s), Compel (2.5s). Diamond: Stronger Stun (1.8s).
ultimate.details: Unleashes psionic wave. Effects differ based on form upon activation.

passives.name: Psychic Shift
passives.details: Switch between Human and Diamond forms (1s cooldown). Diamond grants ~55% Damage Reduction & Unstoppable.

teamups.effect: Grants allies illusion/projection abilities. +100 Max Health for Emma.

lore: Once the White Queen of the Hellfire Club, Emma Frost is an immensely powerful telepath and possesses the ability to transform her body into organic diamond. A complex figure, often switching between hero and anti-hero.
